title: step_1
exercise: Stand facing the barbell, legs about shoulder width apart, with your toes either pointed forward or slightly outwards
think: Keep the bar directly over the middle of your feet

title: step_2
exercise: Bend at the hips and take a mixed grip on the bar
think: Grip the bar elbows are just touching the outside of your legs

title: step_3
exercise: Bend your knees slightly forward, so that your shins are touching the bar
think: Keep your thighs are above your knees in a half-squat position

title: step_4
exercise: Take a deep breath, flex your abdominal muscles, and tighten your lower back

title: step_5
exercise: Start the movement by pressing hard through your legs
think: Trying to leg press the floor away from you

title: step_7
think: take another deep breath, tense your core, and begin the next reps
